title: Orange Step Watch Face
summary: Orange Step - stylish analog interactive watchface. Pedometer, weather, compass.
description: Orange Step is a stylish and useful Android Wear interactive watch face especially designed for every day use. This analog watch face provides excellent readability in low light as well as in daylight and contains set of the most useful indicators. 7 themes available. Interactive widgets (weather forecast, stopwatch,  missed calls, unread sms, heart rate) extended with popup with additional information. Allows to set configuration of the clock and change color theme directly on the watch. Works great on both round and square watches.NOTE: We are constantly working on improvements this watch face. If you have any comments or suggestions please contact us and we will try to include it to next releases.Key features:✔ Interactive Watch Face✔ 7 stylish themes✔ Date✔ Day of the week.✔ Step counter synchronized with your watch embedded pedometer ✔ Watch battery digital and graphical indicator.✔ Phone battery digital and graphical indicator.✔ Missed Calls count.✔ Unread SMS count with SMS reader.✔ Temperature.✔ Weather icon.✔ Weather forecast for 3 days.✔ Stopwatch.✔ Alarm✔ Heart rate indicator✔ Compass synchronized with your watch embedded compass .✔ Use selected theme in ambient mode.Settings:✔ Select themes✔ Enable/disable compass functionality✔ Enable/disable weather.✔ Enable/disable missed calls counter.✔ Enable/disable unread SMS counter.✔ Enable/disable of using selected theme in ambient mode.✔ Select weather update period✔ Select temperature unit (Fahrenheit,Celsius)✔ Select distance unit (steps,km,miles)How to access the watch face settings:- Open Android Wear app- Select "Orange Step" in the "Watch faces"- Tap the gear sign on top of watch face icon.Supported devicesWorks on all Android Wear devices.Supports round (like Moto360, LG G Watch R) and rectangular (e.g. LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch) smartwatches.To install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose  Orange Step Watch Face as your watch face. To change the watch face theme and settings please tap the watch face icon in Android Wear app and select theme and change settings.Sometimes there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, please don't worry and wait up to 10 minutes. This is not caused by the watch face, but Bluetooth LE has limited upload speed.Common Synchronization problem & solution.If the App doesn't appear on your watch please do the following:- make sure the app is successfully downloaded and installed on your phone. Check 'Applications Manager'- uninstall the watch face- disconnect watch from phone- restart your watch device- reconnect watch and phone- install the Orange Step watch face once againIn case of any problem, please don’t rate it 1-star, contact us on alex@alexgalkin.com and give us maximum 24 hours to solve that.
descriptionHTML:
Orange Step is a stylish and useful Android Wear interactive watch face especially designed for every day use. This analog watch face provides excellent readability in low light as well as in daylight and contains set of the most useful indicators. 7 themes available. Interactive widgets (weather forecast, stopwatch, missed calls, unread sms, heart rate) extended with popup with additional information. Allows to set configuration of the clock and change color theme directly on the watch.
Works great on both round and square watches.
NOTE: We are constantly working on improvements this watch face. If you have any comments or suggestions please contact us and we will try to include it to next releases.
Key features:
✔ Interactive Watch Face
✔ 7 stylish themes
✔ Date
✔ Day of the week.
✔ Step counter synchronized with your watch embedded pedometer
✔ Watch battery digital and graphical indicator.
✔ Phone battery digital and graphical indicator.
✔ Missed Calls count.
✔ Unread SMS count with SMS reader.
✔ Temperature.
✔ Weather icon.
✔ Weather forecast for 3 days.
✔ Stopwatch.
✔ Alarm
✔ Heart rate indicator
✔ Compass synchronized with your watch embedded compass .
✔ Use selected theme in ambient mode.

Settings:
✔ Select themes
✔ Enable/disable compass functionality
✔ Enable/disable weather.
✔ Enable/disable missed calls counter.
✔ Enable/disable unread SMS counter.
✔ Enable/disable of using selected theme in ambient mode.
✔ Select weather update period
✔ Select temperature unit (Fahrenheit,Celsius)
✔ Select distance unit (steps,km,miles)


How to access the watch face settings:

- Open Android Wear app
- Select "Orange Step" in the "Watch faces"
- Tap the gear sign on top of watch face icon.


Supported devices

Works on all Android Wear devices.
Supports round (like Moto360, LG G Watch R) and rectangular (e.g. LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch) smartwatches.

To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Orange Step Watch Face as your watch face. To change the watch face theme and settings please tap the watch face icon in Android Wear app and select theme and change settings.

Sometimes there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, please don't worry and wait up to 10 minutes. This is not caused by the watch face, but Bluetooth LE has limited upload speed.

Common Synchronization problem & solution.
If the App doesn't appear on your watch please do the following:
- make sure the app is successfully downloaded and installed on your phone. Check 'Applications Manager'
- uninstall the watch face
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart your watch device
- reconnect watch and phone
- install the Orange Step watch face once again

In case of any problem, please don’t rate it 1-star, contact us on alex@alexgalkin.com and give us maximum 24 hours to solve that.
comments: Needs tweeking Take back all l said a about this watchface. It's stopped counting steps yet again. Have uninstalled, reinstalled,  still no joy. Giving up on it!
Awesome, so beautiful on my Moto 360, love it

My favourite watch face... but ... I also keep getting "unfortunately. ...has stopped" even while writing this review!  I uninstalled and reinstalled the app, but still the same. I have a galaxy note 4. Please fix.

Great face but... Great layout with all the info I need at a glance - clean and sharp. I am using the green/red color scheme. The ambient screen dims and the only thing to disappear of the sweep second hand. Battery life does not appear to be affected but have not had app long. I will update if any significant findings. The problem I have with the analog watch faces, in general, is the hands cover the info at certain times. Suggest make mini distinctive hour and minute hands at the outer edge so as not to cover any info.Thx!
Really like the color, very sharp.
recentChanges: ✔ Fixed issue with crash on some watches
✔ Fixed minor issues in element positions on some watches
✔  Added missed calls list and unread sms reader.
